pages.text: §eLumina, the Sacred Guardian§r, blesses those who perform this purifying ceremony. The golden apple represents divine nourishment and the cleansing of the soul.$(br2)This ritual purifies negative influences and may be requested as a divine task.
Place a §6Golden Apple§r in the brazier as the ritual focus. Arrange the purification components on stone hands, then activate with a §bDiamond§r.

pages.title: Purification Components
pages.text: §lStone Hand Contents:§r$(br)• 4x §eGlowstone Dust§r - divine radiance$(br)• 2x §fMilk Bucket§r - purification$(br)• 2x §6Gold Ingot§r - celestial metal$(br2)The ritual cleanses the soul and strengthens your connection to the light.
